actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize necessary flood protection at locations in Kentucky on an expedited basis.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to design and construct on an expedited basis certain flood control facilities on portions of the Big Sandy River, and the Cumberland River, in Kentucky.

titles.title: A bill to authorize necessary flood protection at locations in Kentucky on an expedited basis.
